apps.name: Budget Penny
apps.description: Budget Penny is your budget assistant that's ready to help in managing your finances. Simply tell her your monthly budget and update her of your expenses as often as you like. Moreover, you can ask her how much is your remaining balance or whether you still have budget.

apps.name: Events Check-in App
apps.description: A tool for checking in participants to an event based on a registration sheet. The app also includes a raffle page which can draw names from the list of checked in participants. This was originally developed for major events of GDG Philippines but it has been used in others' event as well.

apps.name: Exchange Gift Generator
apps.description: A simple exchange gift (Secret Santa) generator built using Google Forms/Spreadsheets and Apps Script.

apps.name: GDG Philippines Assistant App
apps.description: Official Google Assistant App for the Google Developers Group (GDG) Philippines community. You can ask it about the upcoming events and more information about GDG Philippines.
